entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rivière-du-Loup 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
